memberdef.name: CK_ADD_PAIR
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if ((pid) >= 0 && (cid) >= 0) { \ int exists = 0; \ for (int ii = 0; ii < seen_count; ++ii) { \ if (seen[ii].physical_id == (pid) && \ seen[ii].core_id == (cid)) { \ exists = 1; \ break; \ } \ } \ if (!exists && seen_count < seen_cap) { \ seen[seen_count].physical_id = (pid); \ seen[seen_count].core_id = (cid); \ ++seen_count; \ } \ } \ } while (0)
